org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins

Annotation Type PluginBuilderFactory


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface PluginBuilderFactory
    Marks a method as a factory for custom Plugin builders.
